PVE-2024-00001.summary: Dependencies omniauth-saml and ruby-saml through CVE-2024-45409 do not properly verify the signature of the SAML Response. An unauthenticated attacker with access to any signed saml document (by the IdP) can thus forge a SAML Response/Assertion with arbitrary contents. This would allow the attacker to log in as arbitrary user within the vulnerable system
